_header: My triumphs also written with letters of gold
Note: Formerly referred to only in headnote to 1174
Subjects: chronicles; England, kings of; Stephen, King of England; kings of England
_description: Continuation of Hardyng’s chronicle, in which Kings speak of their reigns — rhyme royal stanzas

BodDou341.First Lines:
…My triumphes also written with lettres of goldeabowte my
                    towre standyng at belyngsgateTo thentent my Enemyes shulen BeholdeMy
                    marciall artes and prowes fortunate…
BodDou341.Last Lines:
…With Mawde themperesse to clayme her rightWhom Clare Erle of
                    glocetour with his myght…
